name: just a bossrush game
description:
you have a sheild it points to mouse but you have to put away sheild to fire

leftclick to fire does 1 damage bounces off walls dies when hit dies on sheild

hold rightclick to charge up shot you will turn black when charged up enough to fire it does 3 damage and the more charge the bigger it will be it damages everything it touches becides boss 2's weapon it dieson wall

wasd to move

boss 1's weapon does 1 damage bounces off walls dies on contact with your bullets or your sheild

boss 2's weapon does one damage dies on walls damages everything it touches becides your charged shot it dies on wall but goes through sheild

boss 3's weapon does 1 damage bounces off walls dies on contact with your bullets or your sheild

this game is not suposed to be super easy

click the green flag to restart the game
